name: Pico Dungeon
description:
Our entry for the Buddy Jam 7!

Delve deep into the procedural generated dungeons and slay foes for epic loot and sweet experience.

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Movement
X - Use item
C - Drop item

Created by:
Magic_Spark - Sound, Music, Game Design
Stealthix - Programming, Game Design

Additional thanks to:
KitKatarine - Extensive playtesting
DunkingDev - For helping with the level generation
Lazy Devs - For his awesome YouTube tutorial series about Pico 8
